name: HPXML
body:
## What you need to know

* [HPXML Official Website](http://hpxmlonline.com)
* [HPXML Guide](http://hpxml-guide.readthedocs.org/en/latest/index.html) - A program implementer and software developer guide to get you up and running with HPXML.
* [Schema documentation](schemadoc/index.html) - Graphical navigatable representation of the HPXML schemas.
* [Github repository](http://github.com/hpxmlcommunity/hpxml)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
